headline: Will Lawmakers' H-1B Visa Scrutiny Shift Cognizant Technology Solutions' (CTSH) Global Workforce Narrative?
summary: In recent days, US lawmakers sent letters to Cognizant Technology Solutions and other major tech firms, requesting details about their use of H-1B visas while reducing domestic jobs and seeking information on the wages and roles of visa holders. This move highlights growing regulatory scrutiny of global workforce practices across the technology sector, reflecting broader debates about immigration, employment policies, and potential compliance risks for large IT services providers. We’ll now...
